name: avoid
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to stay away from someone or something

example.eg: I try to avoid supermarkets on Saturdays - they're always so busy.
example.egtrans: 我尽量避开周六去超市——那时总是人特别多。

example.eg: I'm anxious to avoid the motorway at rush hour.
example.egtrans: 在交通高峰时段，我对高速公路唯恐避之不及。

example.eg: Do you think Lukas is avoiding me? I haven't seen him all day.
example.egtrans: 你认为卢卡斯是不是在躲着我啊？我一整天都没见到他。

trans_examp.trans_en: to prevent something from happening or to not allow yourself to do something

example.eg: I try to avoid going shopping on Saturdays.
example.egtrans: 我尽量不在周六去购物。

example.eg: The report studiously avoided any mention of the controversial plan.
example.egtrans: 这份报告有意避而不谈那个有争议的计划。

example.eg: The plane narrowly avoided disaster when one of the engines cut out on take-off.
example.egtrans: 飞机起飞时一个发动机熄火，差点酿成重大事故。

example.eg: I left the pub to avoid a fight (= prevent a fight from happening).
example.egtrans: 我不想动手打架，就离开了酒吧。

example.eg: Unnecessary paperwork should be avoided (= prevented) at all costs.
example.egtrans: 应该尽可能避免不必要的文书工作。
